title: User logs into the secure area with valid credentials
preconditions: The user is at the login page
The user has access to a web browser
main_flow: 4. System checks the username and password against the database.
5. If the credentials are valid, the system displays a "Success" message.
6. The user is redirected to the secure area.
User leaves the login page without logging in.
postconditions: If the login was successful, the user is in the secure area.
If the login failed, the user remains on the login page.
